cast.name: 安德烈·拉坦兹 Andrea Lattanzi

introduction: A pair of outlaws against the world: but these outlaws are a ten-year-old boy and a drug dealer. How did they end up together? They have someone to save. When Denni discovers that his father is beating his mother, he decides to hire the Secco (in his eyes a capable hitman). Set in a desolate winter Riviera, a fairy-tale place where anything seems possible and pain itself is possibility, Santoni’s directorial debut is a coming-of-age film that delicately recounts violence against women, knowing how to look at it across the board and through the eyes of those who, though powerless, decide to act.
